nav.tagline: Navigate with clarity. Shared expeditions appear here.

common.noTags: Add tags to follow recurring motifs.

dashboard.heroDescription: Observe the intentions you set, sync your integration, and share with your crew whenever a journey needs a second perspective.
dashboard.emptyDescription: Create your first expedition to record intention, set & setting, then complete the T+24 journal.
dashboard.error: Unable to load expeditions. Check your Supabase configuration.

auth.loginSubtitle: Log in to continue your integration.
auth.signupSubtitle: Track expeditions and invite your crew.
auth.magicLinkPrompt: Enter your email to receive the magic link.
auth.supabaseMissing: Supabase configuration is missing. Please set NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL and NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.

toasts.loginSuccessDescription: Login successful, have a smooth voyage.
toasts.signupSuccessDescription: Confirm your email to start exploring.
toasts.invitationSuccessDescription: Your crewmate will receive an email to join Magellan.
toasts.reflectionSaveSuccessDescription: Your T+24 journal is up to date.
toasts.crewNoTrip: Create an expedition before sharing it.

expeditions.title: Your journeys & their archetypes
expeditions.subtitle: Browse expeditions and filter recurring motifs.
expeditions.emptyDescription: Plan your next inner voyage and capture the essentials for gentle integration.

newExpedition.title: Map an expedition
newExpedition.description: Detail the intention, timeframe, and safety beacons. You’ll then be guided to the conversational T+24 journal.
newExpedition.safetyPlaceholder: Separate with commas (e.g. sitter, music, check-in)

trip.shareDescription: Invite a crewmate to view or enrich this expedition.
trip.journalDescription: Move forward question by question with the conversational form.
trip.t72Description: Notice what stays alive and explore tensions.
trip.t14Empty: Return in 14 days to honour a lasting trace and prepare your next exploration.
trip.exportsDescription: Prepare a PDF export or share access with your crew.

reflect.title: T+24 Journal
reflect.subtitle: One question at a time. Your answers autosave and stay private unless you choose to share.

conversational.multiEmpty: Add a striking image or symbol.

map.title: Visualise recurring archetypes
map.description: Review tag frequency and reconnect with linked expeditions to deepen integration.
map.motifsDescription: Most used tags appear first. Click to filter expeditions quickly.

settings.title: Preferences & crew
settings.description: Tune your experience, adjust reminders, and invite your crew to view or co-write expeditions.
settings.preferencesDescription: Email notifications, language and time format.
settings.remindersValue: Emails at +1 day for T24, +3 days, +14 days.
settings.immersiveValue: Optimised for keyboard navigation; sounds disabled by default.
settings.shareDescription: Invite a member to read or annotate a specific expedition.
settings.noShares: No sharing yet. Invite your crew to co-integrate.

crew.noTrips: Create an expedition before sharing it.

forms.t24.mood.label: Where do energy, calm, joy, fear, sadness, wonder sit right now?
forms.t24.keyImages.label: List 1 to 3 memorable images / symbols / scenes.
forms.t24.insights.label: If you summarised the lesson in 1-2 sentences?
forms.t24.bodyNotes.label: What did your body say? (breath, tension, ease…)
forms.t24.actionNext.label: A micro-action (< 15 min) within 48h?
forms.t72.contradictions.label: What contradictions, resistances, or shadows appeared?
forms.t72.integration.label: What stays alive? What is fading?
forms.t72.actionSmart.label: Which SMART action will you test this week?
forms.t72.alignment.label: How aligned do you feel (0–7)?
forms.t14.trace.label: Which lasting trace will you honour (ritual, object, gesture, intention)?
forms.t14.longAlignment.label: Long-term alignment (0–7)
forms.t14.therapyQuestion.label: Which question will you bring to therapy or circle?
forms.t14.closing.label: What is the next exploration to note right now?
